answers.answer: Not sure think about 5 weeks llast period was 11th of oct but with pcos my cycles are really irregular

I have Pcos and have been suffering from it for a long time.. i actually had to take fertility treatment to get pregnant.. thank fully i lost alot of weight so it helped.. i did had a miscarriage when i conceived once in 2011 december at 11wks.. after 6 months i was pregnant again.. i lost from 85kg to 62kg.. and now i m 31wks with no difficulties..In PCOS i know miscarriage rates goes above to 40% for women compare to normal rate 25%.. how ever if you have no other problems from PCOS you should be fine.. usually doctors worry when you are above 25 bmi, have diabetes or high blood pressure etc with PCOS.. but i am sure ur doctors will provide extra care from your second trimester.. :).. believe it or not i am clear from gestational diabetes as well... and so far everything is absolutely fine and i have already gained 15kgs already i m 32wks pregnant...
I think I'm just so worried the only problem with pcos iv had is irregular periods its my first pregnancy so  I'm really worried sbout everytging got the midwife tomoz so fingers crossed x
Havent had fertility treatment either x

question: Hi. All just need some advice found out I was preg a week ago n I'm really worried bout misscarigages as iv got pcos and all the complications I just need my mind put to rest I'm hoping everything goes fine hope someone can help thankyou
title: worried
